entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:42 a.m. PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 20.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 11:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 20.7°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near thunderstorms late this afternoon. High 25. Humidex 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
